fee_codes.description: Assistant service eligible for payment upon authorization by a medical consultant following submission of a letter from the surgeon outlining the reason the assistant was required.
fee_codes.conditions: Requires authorization by a medical consultant.

fee_codes.description: Evenings (17:00h – 24:00h) Monday to Friday or daytime and evenings on Saturdays, Sundays or Holidays - increase the total assistant’s fee by 50%.
Nights (00:00h – 07:00h) - increase the total assistant's fee by 75%.
Service provided by the replacement assistant based on the number of time units for the time the replacement assistant is in attendance.
fee_codes.conditions: Time units calculated based on the total time the replacement assistant participates in the case.

fee_codes.description: Special visit premium to assist at non-elective surgery with sacrifice of office hours - first patient seen.
fee_codes.conditions: Not eligible for payment if total surgical assistant's fees exceed 20% of total insured services in a month.

fee_codes.description: Evenings (17:00h - 24:00h) Monday to Friday, first patient seen.
fee_codes.conditions: Only eligible for payment for the first patient seen on each special visit.

fee_codes.description: Saturdays, Sundays or Holidays, daytime and evenings (07:00h-24:00h), first patient seen.
fee_codes.conditions: Only eligible for payment for the first patient seen on each special visit.
Only eligible for payment for the first patient seen on each special visit.
